sortingOutputs.name: sorter_name
sortingOutputs.documentation: The name of the spike sorter used (e.g., kilosort2, herdingspikes)

sortingOutputs.name: sample_rate
sortingOutputs.documentation: Sampling rate of the recording in Hz

sortingOutputs.name: unit
sortingOutputs.documentation: Time unit used for spike_times (typically 'ms' or 's')
